entities.modelContent: {"extendsType":0,"name":"SysUser","attrs":["loginCode: str // 登录名称\r","password: str // 密码\r","qqNo: str // qq号\r","adminFlag: int // 1为管理员,0为普通用户\r","status: int // 1为正常,2未激活,3锁定,0删除\r","lastLoginTime: long // 最后登录时间!\r","lastToken: str // 最后登录Token!\r","lastIp: str // 最后登录Ip!"]}
{"extendsType":0,"name":"SysUserLog","attrs":["userId > SysUser","action: int // 1登录,2登出","remark: str500 // 内容","token: str // 最后登录Token!","ip: str // 最后登录Ip!"]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiPlayer","attrs":["name!: str // 名字 ","state!: int2 = 1 // 玩家状态 0: 正常,1 新手,2 免战玩家,4: 被打完主城的玩家 ","playerGroup: int2 = 0 // 玩家组 0:正常玩家 1:GM 2: NPC ","gender!: int2 = 1 // 性别 1:男 2:女 ","lastCity!: int // 君主将最后所在城池 ","face!: str100 = '' // 脸ID ","flagChar!: str40 = '中' // 旗帜名称 ","playerRank!: int4 = 10000 // 排名 ","prestige!: long = 0 // 声望 ","warPrestige: long = 0 // 战场获得声望 ","warAttackPrestige: long = 0 // 战争进攻获得声望 ","warDefencePrestige: long = 0 // 战争防御获得声望 ","nobility: int4 = 0 // 爵位等级 ","officepos: int4 = 0 // 官职 ","unionId> GiUnion// 联盟ID ","unionPos: int4 = 0 // 联盟职位 ","money: long = 10000 // 元宝 ","armorColumn: int4 = 50 // 用户的装备栏数量 ","vipLevel: int2 = 0 // vip等级 "]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"MemWorldTile","attrs":["tileType: int2 // 格子地型：0:城池;1:平地;2:沙漠;3:森林;4:草地;5:高山;6:湖泊;7:沼泽; ","province: int2 // 州 ","jun: int2 // 郡 ","curLevel: int4 // 当前等级 ","maxLevel: int4 = 30 // 最大等级 ","ownerCityId>GiPlayer// 所属城池 ","state: int2 // 当前状态 "]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiCity","attrs":["playId> GiPlayer","name!: string = '新城池' ","cityType: int2 // 类型0:玩家城池1:名城2:郡城3:州城4:都城5:玩家主城 ","state: int2 // 城池状态0：正常;1：新手保护;2：免战;3：休假 ","chiefhId> GiCityHero//  ","counsellorId> GiCityHero","provinceId> GiCityHero","conscript: int2 = 0 // 否是可以募兵，0表示不可以，1表示可以，大于2，最后招募时间","discardTime: long // 废弃时间"]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiCityBuild","attrs":["cityId> GiCity // 城池ID","bid> CfgBuild // 建筑ID","pos: int2 // 建筑位置","lv: int4 // 建筑等级 ","status: int2 = 0 // 0:正常,1:升级中,2:降级 "]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"MemCityBuildUpgrading","attrs":["buildId> GiCityBuild","status: int2 = 0 // :升级中,2:降级 ","addLevel: int2 = 1 // 操作等级 ","startTime: long // 开始时间 ","endTime: long // 结束时间 "]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiTechnic","attrs":["ownerId> GiPlayer","technicId> CfgTechnic","lv: int2 // 科技等级 "]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"MemTechnicUpgrading ","attrs":["cityId> GiCity\r","technicId> GiTechnic\r","startTime: long // 开始时间 \r","endTime: long // 结束时间 "]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"CfgDefence","attrs":["defenceType: int2 // 城防类型 6：陷阱 7：拒马 8：箭塔 9：滚木 10：雷石 ","name: s100 // 名称 ","description: s500 // 描述 ","hp: int4 // 生命 ","ap: int4 // 攻击 ","dp: int4 // 防御 ","apRange: int4 // 攻击范围 ","speed: int4 // 移动速度 ","carry: int4 // 载重 ","timeNeed: int4 // 招募耗时 ","woodNeed: int4 // 招募耗木材 ","rockNeed: int4 // 招募耗石头 ","ironNeed: int4 // 招募耗铁锭 ","foodNeed: int4 // 招募耗粮食 ","goldNeed: int4 // 招募耗金币 ","areaNeed: int4 // 招募耗城墙空间 "]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"CfgSoldier","attrs":["soldierType: int2 // 兵种类型 1：民夫 2：义兵 3：斥侯 4：长枪兵 5：刀盾兵 6：弓箭兵 7：轻骑兵 8：铁骑兵 9：辎重兵 10：床弩 11：冲车 12：投石车 ","fromCity: int4 // 是否为城内可招兵种 ","name: s100 // 名称 ","description: s1000 // 描述","hp: long // 生命 ","ap: long // 攻击 ","dp: long // 防御 ","apRange: long // 攻击范围 ","speed: long // 移动速度 ","carry: long // 载重 ","timeNeed: long // 招募耗时 ","woodNeed: long // 招募耗木材 ","rockNeed: long // 招募耗石头 ","ironNeed: long // 招募耗铁锭 ","foodNeed: long // 招募耗粮食 ","goldNeed: long // 招募耗金币 ","peopleNeed: long // 招募耗人口 ","foodUse: long // 每小时耗粮食 "]}

{"extendsType":0,"name":"GiCityHero","attrs":["playId> GiPlayer// 归属哪个玩家，如果是NPC的话，为0 ","npcId> CfgHero// 所属npcId,如果是玩家,为0 ","cityId> GiCity","name!: string = '新城池' ","cityType: int2 = 0 // 类型0:玩家城池1:名城2:郡城3:州城4:都城5:玩家主城 ","state: int2 = 0 // 状态：0，空闲；1,城守；2,出征，3,战斗,4，驻守,5,俘虏 ","gender!: int2 // 1男:2女 ","face: int //  ","heroType: int2 // 将领类型,0普通武将，1黄巾活动武将,2聚贤包开出武将,3-9圣诞武将，1001-1005 ","heroHealth: int2 = 0 // 状态：0，健康；1，重伤；2，修养 ","level: int4 // 级别 ","exp: long = 0 // 经验值 ","commandBase: int4 // 领将的统率 ","commandAddOn: int4 // 率统加成 ","affairsBase: int4 // 内政 ","braveryBase: int4 // 勇武 ","wisdomBase: int4 // 智谋 ","affairsAdd: int4 // 内政加点 ","braveryAdd: int4 // 勇武加点 ","wisdomAdd: int4 // 智谋加点 ","affairsAddOn: long // 政内加成 ","braveryAddOn: long // 勇武加成 ","wisdomAddOn: long // 智谋加成 ","forceMaxAddOn: int4 // 体力加成 ","energyMaxAddOn: int4 // 精力加成 ","speedAddOn: int4 // 速度加成 ","attackAddOn: long // 攻击加成 ","defenceAddOn: long // 防御加成 ","loyalty: int4 // 忠诚 "]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiCityDefence","attrs":["cityId> GiCity // 玩家ID ","defenceId> CfgDefence // 城防ID ","count: long // 数量 "]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiCityResource","attrs":["id> GiCity\r","morale: int2 //当前民心\r","moraleStable: int2 //民心稳定值\r","complaint: int2 //民怨\r","tax: int2 //税率\r","wood: long //库存木材\r","woodAdd: long //木材产量\r","woodMax: long //木材上限\r","rock: long //库存石材\r","rockAdd: long //石材产量\r","rockMax: long //石材上限\r","iron: long //库存铁锭\r","ironAdd: long //铁锭产量\r","ironMax: long //铁锭上限\r","food: long //库存粮食\r","foodAdd: long //粮食产量\r","foodArmyUse: long //军队耗粮食\r","foodMax: long //粮食上限\r","gold: long //库存黄金\r","heroFee: long //将领薪水\r","goldMax: long //黄金上限\r","goldRate: int2 //黄金产量分倍率\r","people: long //当前总人口\r","peopleStable: long //人口稳定值\r","peopleWorking: long //工作耗人口\r","peopleBuilding: long //建筑人口\r","peopleMax: long //人口最大值\r","chiefLoyalty: int4 //首领忠诚??\r","changing: long //\r","lastUpdate: long //\r","vacation: int2 //０表示正常，１表示休假\r","forbidden: int2 //０表示正常，１表示封禁\r","autoBuilding: int2 //自动建筑\r","autoTechnic: int2 //自动科技"]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiCityResourceAdd","attrs":["id> GiCity// 唯一主键 ","foodRate: int2 = 80 // 粮食人口生产比例 ","woodRate: int2 = 80 // 木头人口生产比例 ","rockRate: int2 = 80 // 石材人口生产比例 ","ironRate: int2 = 80 // 铁锭人口生产比例 ","foodStore: long = 0 // 仓库存放粮食数量 ","woodStore: long = 0 // 仓库存木头食数量 ","rockStore: long = 0 // 仓库存石材食数量 ","ironStore: long = 0 // 仓库存铁锭食数量 ","foodFieldAdd: long = 0 // 野地对粮食加成 ","woodFieldAdd: long = 0 // 野地对木头加成 ","rockFieldAdd: long = 0 // 野地对石材加成 ","ironFieldAdd: long = 0 // 野地对铁锭加成 ","foodGoodsAdd: long = 0 // 物品对粮食加成 ","woodGoodsAdd: long = 0 // 物品对木头加成 ","rockGoodsAdd: long = 0 // 物品对石材加成 ","ironGoodsAdd: long = 0 // 物品对铁锭加成 ","chiefAdd: long = 0 // 将领加成 ","foodSkillAdd: long = 0 // 科技对粮食加成 ","woodSkillAdd: long = 0 // 科技对木头加成 ","rockSkillAdd: long = 0 // 科技对石材加成 ","ironSkillAdd: long = 0 // 科技对铁锭加成 ","resourceChange: int2 = 0 // 资源是否发生过变化 "]}
